directions: Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker and stir well. Submerse the apple under the other ingredients.
Cook on High for one hour, reduce heat to Low and continue cooking for 5 hours or until pork is cooked through. Discard apple and serve.
ingredients: 1 pound pork roast, cut into 1 inch cubes
1/2 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
title: Easy Pork and Sauerkraut
